name: Maan!
content: Is it recording
Love is life and life is living
F**kin' awesome yeah
I smoked a whole a d**n pound
Eyes closed I won't come down
N***a
I just don't be sharing w**d
Just 'cause you up in this b***h
You better roll somethin'
I'm tryin to OD off THC
Smoke the whole thing up in a week
In a weak in a weak
Roll a joint put a worm around
That motherf**ker smoke it to the face
Awww s**t N***a say he got some
KK and he said he on the way
Said he on the way
Every single day
But we do it anyway 'cuz real
G's smoke when they want
When they say turn down we turn up and
Turn up some more
When they say put it out
It's to loud we burn up some more
Rollin' rollin'
N***a keep going going
Keep the KK blowin blowin
A*s so fat look swollen swollen
Another airport gotta go in go in
I keep rollin' up
SXSW only n***as smokin' on pack
Rollin' the best
Go on get a bong get a match
Everybody get along get attached
Get a song get a biatch
What they say every dog need a cat
Pot heads need a joint to relax
G pen full of wax
10 Rolled cone joints really fast
No sticks no seeds in the bag
Got reason to brag
In the front
Y'all b's in the back
Pair of chucks ripped jeans is the swag
Little b***h we mobbin'
N***a we mobing
We mobing mobing mobing mobing
S**t s**t go go go
N***a we mobing mobing
Now every place that we go they say
We can't smoke
Smoke when they want
When they say turn down
We turn up and turn up some more
When they say put it out
It's to loud we burn up some more
